levels.description: <@ba.vdown>Stops attacking</> and deploys a massive shield, creating a powerful magnetic field. Gains <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</> DEF, deals <@ba.vup>{magic_atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage to all nearby ground enemies every <@ba.vup>{interval}</>s, and drags all unblocked enemies <@ba.vup>slightly</> towards self.
